description: This collection stores the individual survey responses from different businesses. The document ID is the rut of the business that took the survey, linking it back to the business_profiles collection.

schema.is_completed: (Boolean) A flag indicating whether the survey has been completed.
schema.date: (Timestamp) The date and time when the survey was last updated or completed.
schema.data: (Array of Objects) This array holds the answers to the survey questions. Each object represents a single question and answer, and its structure is very similar to the template, but with the addition of the user's answer and some metadata.
